DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , non-randomised pilot study , evaluate user performance system accuracy blood Glucose monitoring system glucose adjustment . Twelve male female volunteer age 18-45 , documented diagnosis Type I diabetes least 12 enrolled study .
DOC.brief_title: User Performance System Accuracy Evaluations Using Glucose Adjustment
DOC.criteria: Summary inclusion criterion . Male female volunteer age 1845 , document diagnosis Type I diabetes least 12 month treat basal bolus insulin regime , deem otherwise healthy determine medical history , physical examination , laboratory test value , vital sign 12lead ECGs screening . Nonsmokers least 12 month study start duration study . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18 ≤ 30 kg/m2 . Able voluntarily provide write informed consent participate study . Must understand purpose risk study agree follow restriction schedule procedure define protocol , confirm informed consent process . Must willing consent data enter The Over Volunteering Prevention System ( TOPS ) . The volunteer 's primary care physician confirm within last 12 month nothing medical history would preclude enrolment clinical study . User Performance Accuracy Testing Only : SelfMonitoring Volunteer currently perform unassisted selfmonitoring blood glucose . Summary exclusion criterion . A severe hypoglycaemic reaction , define causing loss consciousness and/or require outside assistance oral intravenous glucose glucagon injection , within 7 day study start date . Female volunteer pregnant lactating . Positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B hepatitis C. Current history drug alcohol abuse positive drug abuse alcohol test screening checkin . Participation clinical drug study 90 day prior study start . Any clinically significant illness within 30 day prior study start . Donation blood blood product within 30 day prior study start , time study , except require protocol . Weekly alcohol intake exceed equivalent 14 unit per week female 21 unit per week male . Consumption alcoholic beverage within 48 hour prior checkin . Volunteers substantial change eat habit within 30 day prior study start volunteer comply standardised meal propose use study . Prior experience BGMSs use study . Volunteers currently work , previously work , immediate family member work company manufacture market blood glucose monitoring product . Volunteers laboratory train experience ( medical technologist , laboratory technician , laboratory assistant etc ) . Volunteers , opinion Investigator , unsuitable participation study .
